page.title: 11GUIDES
page.content: I am a member of the Haugh of Urr Guides and we meet every Wednesday Night at 7.00 in the School. There are two packs called Swallows and Robins. I am in the Swallows.We have recently completed a concert. We were singing songs, acting comedy sketches and presenting a fashion show. We also made our own crepe paper dresses for the final song. Our concert was for funds so that we may go to the county camp at Gatehouse of Fleet in July. There are other patrols coming from all over Dumfries and Galloway. When at the camp we will be taking part in activities such as nature trails, swimming, orienteering and investigating history in local graveyards. These are the names of the people that are in the Guides:- WENDY, KIRSTY, LISA, ELAINE, LOUISE, SIMONE and myself CLAIRE.
